name: BK Pack
desc: 1 Year Program that has everything you need to reach your maximum potential.

name: UpperBody Pack
desc: 4 to 6 Month program to increase bench, tone and upperbody strength.

name: LowerBody Pack
desc: 3 to 5 Month program to increase leg strength, tone and squat power.

name: Sonic Pack
desc: 25 week program to increase accelerarion, top-endspeed and velocity.

name: Explosiveness Pack
desc: 3 month program to increase overall explosiveness and power.

name: Bunnies Pack
desc: 20 week program to increase vertical jump and off the ground quickness.

name: Agility Pack
desc: 12 week program to increase footwork, change of direction and overall agility.

name: Coordination Pack
desc: 10 week program to increase hand-eye coordination and overall catching.

name: Muscle Gain Pack
desc: 6 Month program to increase muscle definition in all areas and a well balanced diet.

name: Weight Loss Pack
desc: 12 month program that ensures weight loss, diet plans and supplements.

name: Flexibility Pack
desc: 18 week program to increase flexibility and stretching through all areas of the body.

name: Mindset Pack
desc: Lifetime program which develops and strengthen mindset, inner-peace and ambition.
